# The `NodeMetadata` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Holds solver state and other metadata relevant to each <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp">PBQP</a> RA node.
